StuffedBear.synopsis: This is Darkmaw the Wicked. He is a huge stuffed bear right by the entrance to Last Light. If the player passes a nature check, they recall the story of Darkmaw, and wonder how he ended up in a tavern, of all places.
StuffedBear.how_to_trigger: Click on Darkmaw the Wicked, the huge bear statue right next to the entrance to last light inn.

automatic_ordering.reasoning: There is only one session ('StuffedBear') provided. There are no indications in its synopsis or trigger that imply it must follow or precede any other session, and there are no conflicts with other sessions. Therefore, no ordering or exclusiveness constraints are applicable.

StuffedBear_0.speaker: Player
StuffedBear_0.text: Is that Darkmaw the Wicked? I don't believe it.
StuffedBear_0.context: InternalNodeContext: Nature skill check succeeded.NodeContext: looking at a stuffed bear statue, it's huge. You recognise it.

StuffedBear_2.speaker: Player
StuffedBear_2.text: His territory ran from the Wood of Sharp Teeth to Cloakwood. It took half an army to drive him out. How did he end up here?
StuffedBear_2.context: NodeContext: looking at a stuffed bear statue, it's huge

StuffedBear_1.speaker: Player
StuffedBear_1.text: What a vicious looking creature. I swear its eyes are following me.
StuffedBear_1.context: InternalNodeContext: Nature skill check did not succeedNodeContext: looking at a stuffed bear statue, it's huge
